name: Happy Halloween Jungle Jumper-Pumpkin Dive
description:
WARNING Highly addictive !!!

Jump, Fly, & Boost your way up as you collect precious coins, jems, power ups and highscores!

Unlock special levels with secret bonuses and many more surprises!

Move over Pumpkin Jump there is a new game taking over!

FEATURING
- Crazy jumping gameplay
- Precious coins to collect
- Challenging levels
- Highscores to claim

And many more suprises!

Brainless Apps are dedicated to updating our games regularly to make sure they deliver the very best gaming experience. If you have any issues to report or suggestions to make, please email the device you’re using, iOS version, and a detailed description of the problem to: brainless.apps1@gmail.com

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
